page.title: 08MARKET DAY IN BISHOPS CASTLE
page.content:
{It is market day on Friday. It is busier than other days.A lot of people go in and out of the market.
Old people talk about things or stand about doing nothing.The market used to be a school.It sells fruit, vegtables, cheese, chicken, flower's plant's and fresh fish. Also there is a stall that sells cakes and buns.
There are lots of cars and a few lorries delivering goods to shops and going to the cattle market.There are a few mums and dads pushing little children in prams and pushchairs. There are lots of cars parked up and down the street. Some farmers talk about their crops their farms and animals and different kinds of machinery.
